duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently and proactively managing the Commercial Property claims program within the Commercial Lines Department.
Communicating claims issues with clients, carriers, and producers.
Regularly reviewing claim status and following up as needed.
Researching and obtaining claims data from carriers as needed.
Keeping Broker Management System up to date with correspondence and notes on open claims.

education_certification.credential: P&C/Adjusters License required or able to obtain within 120 days from hire
